import React, { useState } from 'react'; // Use the global icons from the CDN const ContactMe = React.forwardRef((props, ref) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Form submitted:', formData); }; return (
